mapper.insert: INSERT INTO screening (movie_id, cinema_id, hall_name, row_count, col_count, start_time, end_time, price) VALUES (#{movieId}, #{cinemaId}, #{hallName}, #{rowCount}, #{colCount}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{price})
mapper.select: SELECT id, movie_id, cinema_id, hall_name, row_count, col_count, start_time, end_time, price FROM screening WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT s.id, m.name AS movieName, s.hall_name, s.row_count, s.col_count, s.start_time, s.end_time, s.price, s.create_time, s.update_time FROM screening s LEFT JOIN movie m ON s.movie_id = m.id
AND s.cinema_id = #{cinemaId}
AND m.name LIKE concat('%', #{movieName}, '%')
ORDER BY s.update_time DESC
SELECT id, hall_name, start_time, end_time, price FROM screening WHERE cinema_id = #{cinemaId} AND movie_id = #{movieId} AND start_time > NOW() ORDER BY start_time
